name: Will - a short interactive storytelling game
name_original: Will - a short interactive storytelling game
description:
A very short cutscene based game. Made by 3 people for Ludum Dare 45 with the help of UNOG community.

Controls are simple: WASD , X , C

(Using headphones recommended for a more pleasurable gameplay , especially in credits....)

Please dont forget to give feedback if you play the game , even if you dont like it.

Also you can contact me by my twitter - @sagylel
